meta.title: Yash Hulle | Web Developer
meta.description: Passionate Web Developer skilled in JavaScript, Next.js, and MERN stack

personal.name: Yash Hulle
personal.title: Web Developer
personal.objective: Passionate Web Developer skilled in JavaScript, Next.js, and MERN stack, eager to build scalable and user-friendly web applications. Seeking an opportunity to apply my technical expertise and problem-solving skills in a dynamic team.
personal.shortBio: Building scalable and user-friendly web applications using JavaScript, Next.js, and MERN stack. Turning ideas into reality through code.

summary: Hello! I'm Yash Hulle, a passionate Web Developer skilled in JavaScript, Next.js, and MERN stack. Based in Pune, Maharashtra, I'm currently pursuing Computer Science at G H Raisoni University, Amravati with a CGPA of 8.3.

I have a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Next.js, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS for frontend development and Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, SQL, Firebase for backend solutions. I enjoy working on challenging projects and continuously improving my skills.

In my spare time, I enjoy exploring the latest web technologies, contributing to open-source projects, and staying updated with industry trends. I'm also interested in AI and machine learning, and how they can be applied to web development.

description: Optimized UI with Next.js, Bootstrap, and JavaScript for a MERN stack project.
Integrated backend APIs with MongoDB & Express.js, improving data flow.
Debugged & deployed features in an Agile team, enhancing user experience.
Designed and developed interactive web pages using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, improving user experience.
Integrated responsive design principles, ensuring mobile-friendly UI for improved accessibility.
Worked in an Agile team, contributing to front-end enhancements and assisting with bug fixes.

projects.title: Opex Home Solutions
projects.description: Developed a MERN stack web app for home design solutions using React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB, AWS. Optimized UI performance, integrated authentication, and enabled real-time database updates.

projects.title: Portfolio Hub
projects.description: Built a responsive portfolio builder with real-time project management using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Node.js. Integrated secure user authentication and customizable UI for seamless portfolio creation and sharing.

projects.title: THE CAKE HEAVEN
projects.description: Designed and deployed a cake ecom website with tech stack using Next.js, Tailwind, Cloudinary and MongoDB. Improved accessibility and boosting user engagement and mobile usability.

projects.title: College Website
projects.description: This project is a college web application that manages all college activities and information, developed using HTML, CSS, and Python Framework.

projects.title: Restaurant Website
projects.description: Key contributor to an elegant restaurant website with features such as online reservations and menu browsing, developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

contact.message: If you have any questions or just want to say hello, feel free to drop me a message!
